thread.title_full: 7 Couture Looks a Pregnant Amal Clooney Could Wear to Work or the Red Carpet

title: 7 Couture Looks a Pregnant Amal Clooney Could Wear to Work or the Red Carpet
text: Amal Clooney Is Pregnant! 7 Couture Looks the Expectant Mom Can Wear to Work or the Red Carpet February 9, 2017 10:40 PM 1 / 8 Photo: Splash News Clooney fans, rejoice! After at least a month of speculation , earlier today it was reported that Amal and George Clooney are expecting twins . And while details of the pregnancy are still being kept mum, it’s worth noting that Clooney has already hinted at an haute maternity style, having sported a Dolce & Gabbana mini frock in London and a vintage Chanel couture dress in Davos, Switzerland. However, one of the world’s most famous human rights attorneys has her down days, too, and has embraced casual, comfy clothes while in the English countryside and a grown-up spin on the model-off-duty uniform for her stateside return last week . And while it will be a moment before we learn any more information—boy, girl, both?!—we know that Clooney will be continuing to head to work at Doughty Street Chambers and likely accompanying her husband during awards season. Here, in anticipation of months’ worth of major maternity moments, are seven pieces from the Spring 2017 Couture collections that will suit the mother-to-be—whether she’s hitting the office or the red carpet. In This Story: Amal Clooney Recommended For You
